System Requirements

NvAPI Files

Make sure you have the following files:

  • nvapi.h (all functions not called out in header files below)
  • nvapi_lite_d3dext.h (most useful DirectX functions)
  • nvapi_lite_sli.h (most useful SLI functions)
  • nvapi_lite_stereo.h (most useful 3D Stereo functions)
  • nvapi_lite_surround.h (most useful Surround functions)
  • nvapi_lite_common.h (common APIs - included in all the above header files)
  • nvapi_lite_salstart.h (defines SAL - included in all the above header files)
  • nvapi_lite_salend.h (undefines SAL - included in all the above header files)
  • nvapi.lib (for 32-bit support)
  • nvapi64.lib (for 64-bit support)

Operating System and Platforms

The current version of NvAPI is supported on Windows XP, Windows Vista and later, both 32-bit and 64-bit architectures. Some API calls are OS specific–see the individual calls for OS support information.

NVIDIA ForceWare Driver Version

NvAPI is supported on ForceWare driver versions 81.20 and up. See the individual calls for specific driver version information.
